column3: Maybe I should take that picture off the dashboard
column4: Before her memory hits the brakes and takes the wheel
column5: Yeah,, I bet she's still crying on that front porch
column6: Yeah,, this time it's gonna take some time to heal
column9: Cause I'm on my way to Tennessee
column11: Chasing what they say's a dream
column13: Cause that girl's in every song I sing
column14: She's in every song I write
column15: And that six string ridin' in her seat
column17: God what am I supposed to do
column18: There's more than miles in my rearview
column21: Well,, I'm headed north to what I swore I wanted
column22: And trying not to buy into my doubts
column23: But I just can't seem to keep myself from wondering
column24: Why I'm jealous of all them headlights headed south
column30: Yeah,, I've been changing lanes without my mirrors
column31: Cause every time I look behind me I see her
column32: I think I just realized how much I need her
